text: Medvedevo () is a rural locality (a village) in Levinskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 5 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located on the Siva River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Medvedevo, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai
